title: Great Leader Christopher Ong Launches New Recruitment Drive for SPhL
description: To ensure the long-term sustainability of the Singapore Physics League, Great Leader has launched a new recruitment drive. Please sign up here.

title: Long Live SPhL
description: Under the guidance of Great Leader Christopher Ong, High Commandant Paul Seow, and Supreme Commissar Chen Guangyuan, the Singapore Physics League shall live for 1000 years.
